name: iPhone/iPad/iPod Backup Extractor
short_description:
Most users prefer backing up their iDevice data onto a computer with iTunes program, this single backup solution will likely result in that you cannot restore your lost data from backup once you failed in jailbreaking, upgrade, restore factory settings, or your devices was stolen or crashed. In case of these issues, Vibosoft iPhone/iPad/iPod Backup Extractor will be your best choice, which gives you the ability to fully extract all data from iTunes backup files without any loss. Be fully compatible with iPhone, iPad, iPod.
- Restore iPhone/iPad/iPod Data from old backup files in iTunes without any loss.
- Support dozens of file types: SMS, contacts, photos, music, movies and calendar.
- Humanized design, clear structure and arbitrarily preview all files with details.
- Extract your files from iDevices to computer and save them in a readable format.
summary: 3-in-1 Backup Extractor - Extract Data from iTunes Backup Files
